chapter.text: There were a lot of questions about “Hetch’s creation” as well. ^1500Although I couldn’t be there to direct,^500 I believe that he did a good job with the set that he was given. ^1500Even if he can be a bit dramatic at times. ^1500I mean,^500 do you have any idea how many times that guy stabbed himself in the gut to make sure the cut looked right?
